snippet: MUELLER--John Cochran, 80, of New York City, died on January 21, 2016. A memorial service celebrating his life will be held at Church of the Incarnation, 209 Madison Avenue (at 35th St.) Wednesday, May 18, 2016, at 4pm. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MUELLER--John Cochran, 80, of New York City, died on January 21, 2016. A memorial service celebrating his life will be held at Church of the Incarnation, 209 Madison Avenue (at 35th St.) Wednesday, May 18, 2016, at 4pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  MUELLER, JOHN COCHRAN
